title: Shakespeare | As you like it (Romance, 1936) Elisabeth Bergner, Laurence Olivier | Movie, Subtitles

sources.title: Shakespeare | As you like it (Romance, 1936) Elisabeth Bergner, Laurence Olivier | Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
Classic romantic comedy about Rosalind, the daughter of an exiled Duke, who falls in love with Orlando, a young man from a rival family. After being banished by her uncle, Rosalind disguises herself as a boy and flees into the forest with her cousin Celia, where they encounter Orlando and a host of other characters. William Shakespeare's play explores themes of love, mistaken identities, and reconciliation.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/Z_GgEBG7UJ4
Director: Paul Czinner
Writers: William Shakespeare & J.M. Barrie, Robert Cullen, Carl Mayer
Stars: Elisabeth Bergner, Laurence Olivier, Sophie Stewart
Genres: Drama, Comedy, Literature, Romance
